Methods code

newdescriptiontopprevnext
sub new {
my ($class,%args)=@_;
my $db=lc($args{DB})||die "No database name provided when trying to talk";
die "$db is not a valid external source at the moment" unless (grep(/\b$db\b/i,@main::knowndb));
my $file="regdb/talk/$db".'.pm';
require($file);
return "regdb::talk::$db"->new(%args);
}
